column4: Hey guys I'm having an nfs failure here. The following message shows up in dmesg after trying to list the contents of the export on a mac osx client:
[79615.137072] rpcbind: server <client_hostname> not responding, timed out

I am able to successfully mount the share and access everything fine in the command line, but as soon as I try to access the folder in finder, I get a disconnect message (and 2-6 iterations of that error in dmesg/syslog). Does anyone have any idea what might cause this?
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
